content: Hi, all! Have a PR up on a branch of my own mathlib4 fork, but need to move it to an upstream branch for CI. Could I please have write access for non-master branches? My GitHub username is michaellee94. Thanks so much!
@Scott Morrison, surely that should read "mathlib4"?
Oops, I copied and pasted from upstream, which I suspect was from a standard post from Johan's buffer.
